publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-4175 Pauline McNeill: 2009 Commonwealth Table Tennis Championships—That the Parliament welcomes the Commonwealth Table Tennis Championships to Glasgow’s Scotstoun Sports Campus; notes that during the championships, from 19 and 25 May 2009, three hundred players from over 20 nations across the Commonwealth will compete in seven different competitions; further notes that Glasgow’s Scotstoun Campus will also host the table tennis competition of the 2014 Commonwealth Games; recognises that hosting the championships is a boost for the sport in both Glasgow and Scotland, and hopes that Scotland’s involvement will boost its medal chances at the 2014 Commonwealth Games. Supported by: Jackie Baillie*, Patricia Ferguson*, Ross Finnie*, Jamie McGrigor*, Johann Lamont*, Mr Frank McAveety*, Sandra White*, Gil Paterson*, Ian McKee*, Cathy Jamieson*, Claire Baker*, Kenneth Gibson*, Sarah Boyack*, Bill Kidd*
S3M-4175 2009 Commonwealth Table Tennis Championships (lodged on 19 May 2009) Elaine Murray*, Bill Butler*, Jamie Hepburn*

S3M-4175 Pauline McNeill: 2009 Commonwealth Table Tennis Championships—That the Parliament welcomes the Commonwealth Table Tennis Championships to Glasgow’s Scotstoun Sports Campus; notes that during the championships, from 19 and 25 May 2009, three hundred players from over 20 nations across the Commonwealth will compete in seven different competitions; further notes that Glasgow’s Scotstoun Campus will also host the table tennis competition of the 2014 Commonwealth Games; recognises that hosting the championships is a boost for the sport in both Glasgow and Scotland, and hopes that Scotland’s involvement will boost its medal chances at the 2014 Commonwealth Games. Supported by: Jackie Baillie, Patricia Ferguson, Ross Finnie, Jamie McGrigor, Johann Lamont, Mr Frank McAveety, Sandra White, Gil Paterson, Ian McKee, Cathy Jamieson, Claire Baker, Kenneth Gibson, Sarah Boyack, Bill Kidd, Elaine Murray, Bill Butler, Jamie Hepburn, Bob Doris*, Mary Mulligan*, Liam McArthur*, Jack McConnell*, Marilyn Livingstone*
S3M-4175 2009 Commonwealth Table Tennis Cham pionships (lodged on 19 May 2009) Dr Richard Simpson*, Robin Harper*
S3M-4175 2009 Commonwealth Table Tennis Championships (lodged on 19 May 2009) Des McNulty*, Jim Tolson*
S3M-4175 2009 Commonwealth Table Tennis Championships (lodged on 19 May 2009) Hugh Henry*
S3M-4175 2009 Commonwealth Table Tennis Championships (lodged on 19 May 2009) Ken Macintosh*
S3M-4175 2009 Commonwealth Table Tennis Championships (lodged on 19 May 2009) Stuart McMillan*
